rules_text:
When Warp-Space Wanderer enters, create a 3/3 colorless Vehicle artifact token with flying and crew 1.
Whenever a Vehicle crewed by Warp-Space Wanderer this turn deals combat damage to a player, transmogrify Warp-Space Wanderer. [i](Exile it, then conjure a random card with the same type and cost to the battlefield.)[/i]
